title: How to Get a Bike in Pokémon Red

steps.title: Go to Vermillion City.
steps.content: Go to Vermillion City. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the Pokémon Fan Club.
steps.content: Go to the Pokémon Fan Club. It's in the southwest part of the city, just north of the gym. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Talk to the chairman of the Fan Club.
steps.content: Talk to the chairman of the Fan Club. He's on the left side of the couch at the back of the building.

steps.title: Say "Yes" when he asks you if you want to hear about his favorite Pokémon.
steps.content: Say "Yes" when he asks you if you want to hear about his favorite Pokémon. He'll talk about his favorite Pokémon for a while, then he'll give you a Bike Voucher. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to Cerulean City.
steps.content: Go to Cerulean City. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the Bike Shop, the southwestern-most building.
steps.content: Go to the Bike Shop, the southwestern-most building.

steps.title: Talk to the man behind the counter to exchange your Bike Voucher for a Bicycle.
steps.content: Talk to the man behind the counter to exchange your Bike Voucher for a Bicycle.
